ComicInfo.Summary:
With the battle against the parasitic Glarkian menace escalating, Vampblade’s friends pitch in to help her fight. As Satya armors up, Henry and Grizmo must merge once more to form the hulking gremlin-beast, Grizzry!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Mastajwood | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Mastajwood | 4 | | E | Amalgama Cat Fight Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Marco Maccagni | 5 | | F | Risqué Amalgama Cat Fight Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 6 |
*Notes* Issue #43 in a series. The digital edition (11/30/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Home Sweet Home Part Two
